 Pay any amount of C to deal that much damage to all enemy units at a battlefield.

Riftbound. The Boss. Rarity: Rare. Color: Orange,Yellow. Type: Legend. Super: Champion. Tags: Sett. How to play this card: When a buffed unit you control would die, you may pay C and exhaust me to spend its buff and recall it exhausted instead. Send it to base. This isn't a move.
 When you conquer, ready me.
